de.systemagmbh.interfaces.logger
Interface ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch

All Known Subinterfaces:
ISysLogConstants
All Known Implementing Classes:
ASysBus, ASysLogger, ASysService, CSysCheckerByLevelCombination, CSysCheckerByLevelRange, CSysLog, CSysLogConstantsConverter
public interface ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch

To have the possiblility to make some log output besides the output of the finished program, the DEV_LOG constant should be used. This has to be set to true for development and to false for delivery to the customer. The compiler will filter these if-conditions at compilation time and not at run time.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich

Field Summary
static boolean DEV_LOG
          This boolean has to be set to true while development and to false for delivery.
 

Field Detail

DEV_LOG

public static final boolean DEV_LOG
This boolean has to be set to true while development and to false for delivery. Because it is final it is filtered at compilation time when set to false.
